entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.4°C

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
